hotels.description: This exclusive aparthotel is strategically located in Lisbon's historical centre, in the popular Restauradores Square, close to some of the most important tourist attractions of the area. An old Art Deco cinema in the old days, this building was fully renovated to the last detail and to the modern standards that travellers demand. It was awarded by the Portuguese Government in 1996 as 'The Best Urban Renovation Project' and 'The Best Tourism Project in Portugal'. For this reason, it is very appreciated by the quality of its equipment and architecture, as well as its location. This luxurious aparthotel provides a choice of studios and apartments including separate work areas and wide range of services to guarantee both a comfortable and productive stay, such as wireless internet connection. Guests can also enjoy a dip in the swimming pool and share nice moments with friends in the terrace bar, featuring one of the best panoramic views over Lisbon.

hotels.description: This modern Lisbon apartment hotel is less than 10 minutes' walk from Marquês de Pombal and Avenida da Liberdade. It is located near Lisbon's most fashionable shopping areas such as the Avenida da Liberdade and Rua Castilho, historic neighbourhoods such as Príncipe Real and Bairro Alto. The hotel is located just 400 metres from Marquês de Pombal Station and 3 km from St. George Castle. There are several restaurants offering regional cuisine located a 5-minute walk away. The Altis Prime is the perfect place to work and relax with a sundeck with Jacuzzi on the rooftop, where you can relax and enjoy the fantastic views over the cityscape. All guests at the Altis Prime Hotel have free access to the indoor pool and GSpa of the Altis Grand Hotel (1 minute walking distance)  and they also have special conditions when using the BSpa at the Altis Belém Hotel.

hotels.description: Besides offering a marvellous luxurious stay, this sophisticated establishment also offers a prime location as it is situated in the heart of Lisbon, within walking distance of public transport and close to many important local attractions and entertainment options. The hotel presents a stylish interior design with African and Eastern Renaissance touches, offering a charming ambiance. The rooms are decorated in warm tones with top-notch amenities to ensure an unforgettable stay. Guests can sample delicious French cuisine with Portuguese influences in a chic atmosphere as well as an extensive list of regional and international wines. Those travelling on business purposes may take advantage of the excellent meeting facilities offered by the hotel and after a busy day of work, they can relax in the fitness room. hotels.description: Situated in the historic and commercial centre of Lisbon, this enchanting hotel is a popular choice for travellers seeking a comfortable accommodation in Portuguese capital. Its privileged location la Baixa Lisboeta is one of the most notable gains of this emblematic building of downtown Lisbon. The Hotel is located in the parallel street to one of the most prestigious commercial streets of the city, Rua Augusta, and 7 km from the airport. Nestled just 200 meters from the Santa Justa Elevator, the central inspiration of the decor of this unique establishment offers peaceful setting for all those wishing to explore the city. The rooms are beautifully appointed and well-equipped with modern amenities. Most of the units feature views of the monumental city area. Guests may indulge in authentic Portuguese cuisine served at the glamorous hotel restaurant. This modern establishment offers room and laundry service as well parking and 24-hour reception for added convenience.

hotels.description: This luxurious hotel is located in uptown Lisbon, just a few steps from different public transport links. The nearby metro station will place visitors in the historic downtown (Rossio square and Chiado) in just 10 minutes whilst Sintra is easily reachable by train. Guests will find a choice of tastefully decorated guest rooms fitted with LCD HD TVs and featuring fully entertainment systems with satellite channels, video games, radio and video-on-demand. They all come complete with a private bathroom with top quality toiletries, minibar and tea and coffee facilities. Complimentary Wi-Fi internet connection is also available. This outstanding establishment features a 3000 sqm spa area with a complete wellness centre, a fully equipped gym, an indoor heated pool and 13 treatment rooms. The Executive Club Lounge is also unique in Portugal, offering a 360º overview of Lisbon and including an area greater than 2000 sqm. This property also features a lush garden with water falls, a bar and a terrace lounge area for outdoor amusement, and awarded as an Energy Efficient hotel in Lisbon, having won the EUROPE'S LEADING GREEN HOTEL 2015, at the World Travel Awards.

hotels.description: It's not just another hotel in Lisbon. It is the Palácio do Governador (Governor's Palace, in English), with 60 different rooms near the Tagus river in the historic centre of Belém, one of the most beautiful and emblematic areas of the capital. Built on the site of the former house of the governor of the Tower of Belém, exquisitely restored, on top of roman ruins probably from the 1st to the 5th century, the Palácio do Governador is a palatial building with a reception that once was a chapel, a restaurant with original domes as ceilings and contemporary SPA that's linked to the ancient thermal traditions of Mediterranean cultures. Close to the Tagus and national historic monuments, the Palácio do Governador is the natural choice for anyone who wants to be in Lisbon, near everything, from culture to leisure and far enough from the frenzy of the city centre. hotels.description: The property is just 200 metres away from Chiado, the new heart of Lisbon's attractions. Alfama and Baixa Pombalina are just a few meters away. Only a short distance away is '24 de Julho', the Docas and Santa Apolónia, where Lisbon nightlife is at its best. A bus stop is located about 2 minutes' walk from the hotel and the nearest metro station is some 5 minutes' walk away.  The total of 11 apartments and studios are in a brand new building, centrally located in one of the oldest parts of Lisbon. They combine the modern, comfortable accommodation of a luxuriously decorated apartment with the service of a hotel. Facilities include a lobby, 24-hour check-out service, a hairdressing salon, wireless Internet access and room service.  The deluxe studio apartments offer a modern welcoming space and are ideal for up to 3 people. The luxury apartments have a large room with double bed and a sofa bed, an independent fully equipped kitchen, a modern bathroom and a large room with sofa bed, fully equipped kitchenette and stand-alone double bedroom. The private bathrooms offer a shower and hairdryer. Standard in-room amenities include satellite/cable TV, Internet access, a fridge, cooker, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities, a washing machine, ironing set and individually regulated air conditioning.

hotels.description: Hotel do Chiado is located in Chiado, Lisbon's historic district, near Bairro Alto, Rossio Square and Avenida da Liberdade. The hotel was built in the historic building of Armazéns do Chiado, nowadays a shopping centre, which was completely restored by the famous architect Siza Vieira after the tragic fire of 1988. Situated in Chiado, the trendiest, most elegant and chic meeting point in Lisbon, this is the only hotel in town that offers rooms with private terraces and panoramic views of the Castle and the Tagus River. The subway station Baixa-Chiado is located beneath the building and guests can easily find a taxi service next to the hotel.  The bar Entretanto, located on the 7th floor is well-known for having the best view of Lisbon. It's the perfect place for a romantic dinner, a gathering with friends, an informal meeting or just to relax at the end of a working day.

hotels.description: The hotel is located next to the imposing Jerónimos Monastery and Belém Cultural Centre, which houses the famous Berardo Collection Museum. The Belém Tower, the Monument of the Discoveries, the Royal Coaches National Museum, the Navy Museum and the Tropical Garden are all only a few steps away from the hotel. Guests may also enjoy sea walks to different docks, as well as the famous ‘Pastéis de Belém'. Furthermore, the hotel offers easy access to Lisbon's Congress Centre and the main business centres, which are in close proximity. Lisbon's Portela Airport is some 10 km away.  This new city hotel, Lisbon's first design hotel, is a new departure owing to its concept and location. It is conveniently located in Belém, at the heart of Lisbon's major monuments and museums. This urban resort incorporates three colours into its contemporary design: an exciting chocolate brown, stimulating carmine red and a relaxing cream colour, all of which combine to incite surprising feelings of harmony and tranquillity in an increasingly cosmopolitan Lisbon. The quality of the service will add a touch of refinement that is expected of most cultural and social events. Guests are welcomed into the hotel lobby at this air-conditioned establishment, which features 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe and lift access. Further facilities include a hairdressing salon, bar and a restaurant. Internet access is available, and conference facilities are provided for business guests. Guests may also take advantage of the hotel's room and laundry services (fees apply).

The Alfama district, St. George's Castle and Mouraria are all just a stone´s throw and the Tagus riverside area with its famous night life is also within easy walking distance. The building and rooms combine traditional architecture with stylish furnishings and guests can relax on the sun terrace. This non-smoking hotel offers triple, double and single rooms, the latter two types with their own private bathrooms, all accommodations being air-conditioned and equipped with radio and satellite television. hotels.description: Fontecruz Lisboa Hotel, Autograph Collection is a chic 5-star boutique property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Lisbon. Highlights include a fine restaurant, an open-air lounge terrace, free Wi-Fi and a great location on Avenida da Liberdade; Avenida da Liberdade is a wide, tree-lined boulevard linking the historic public square Praca dos Restauradores with Parque Eduardo VII. Nearby places of interest include the National Theatre D. Maria II and the Natural History Museum and Botanical Garden of the University of Lisbon. Avenida metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Lisbon destinations; The hotel is housed in a mid-rise property which combines classic and contemporary architecture. The facade is partly dark-tiled, with decorative stonework above the windows and wrought iron balconies, and part glass-panelled; Facilities include an open-air lounge terrace, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises; Standard rooms are 26-29sqm and stylishly decorated. Amenities include air-conditioning, a work desk, a mini-bar, a safe, a flat-screen HDTV and a marble en-suite bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and complimentary toiletries; The hotel restaurant offers fine Portuguese and Spanish cuisine paired with Iberian wines. Guests can also enjoy drinks and snacks at the stylish bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity; The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable covered parking is possible onsite.

hotels.description: Boasting a privileged location right in the heart of the vibrant Lisbon, this elegant and distinguished hotel offers the perfect base from which to explore all the hidden treasures of this enchanting region. Rafaelo Bordalo Pinheiro Museum, Dos Jerónimos Monastery, Belem Tower, Nacional de Queluz Palace and Sao Jorge Castle are just a few of the wide range of attractions not to be missed. The tastefully decorated guest rooms feature 18th century replica furnishings as well as an outstanding collection of contemporary Portuguese tapestries and paintings. Guests staying at this charming establishment may have the chance to enjoy the ultimate experience in luxury in the multi-sensory spa with a large choice of treatment rooms. The onsite restaurant features privileged views over Eduardo VII Park and offers fresh grills and Mediterranean vegetables.

hotels.description: This comfort hotel is located on Rossio Square, right by Praça dos Restauradores and close to Rossio train station in the heart of the city. The hotel offers a wonderful view of the nearby São Jorge castle complex and the old town quarter, Alfama. It is located just a few steps from public transport as well as plenty of sightseeing attractions. In addition, Lisbon airport is located 15 km away.Housed in a building dating back to 1892, this luxurious hotel comprises a total of 82 rooms. The hotel features a bar, , a breakfast room and conference facilities.  A TV rooms is also available for guests.Those arriving by car may make use of the hotel car park and garage facilities.The modern rooms each are all well-equipped.  Guests may select their breakfast from an ample buffet. The hotel offers bed & breakfast.

hotels.description: This hotel is in located near the Tagus River, in one of Lisbon's most historical districts, Belém. This hotel enjoys unrivalled views of the Tagus River and all of Lisbon is within easy reach through public transportation. There is a TV lounge, cafe, a bar and a restaurant, conference facilities, and Wi-Fi (charges apply). Room and laundry services are available, for an additional fee. There are parking facilities available for those arriving by car.  Altis Belém Hotel & Spa is a 5 star design hotel in Lisbon, located in Belém overlooking the Tagus River, representing a contemporary view of the Golden Ages of Portugal during the Discoveries in the 15th and 16th centuries. Here you can find the signature Restaurant Feitoria (One Michelin Star) and the Spa BSpa by Karin Herzog, an awarded signature spa that is unique in Portugal.

hotels.description: This historical hotel enjoys a stunning setting at the heart of the mesmerising city of Lisbon. The hotel is located in the historical centre of the city, immersed in the rich culture and traditions, for which it is renowned. Guests can explore the charming district of Rossio, or venture a little further and discover the beauty of Alfama, Chiado and Bairro Alto. This wonderful hotel is just a 15 minutes' walk away from Sao Jorge Castle. Rua Augusta shopping street can be found just 400 metres away, where guests can indulge in a spot of retail therapy. Lisbon International Airport is just a short drive away. This charming hotel dates back to the early 20th century. The guest rooms were stunningly designed by the renowned designer, Joao Rolo. The hotel's extensive range of facilities and services is sure to impress even the most discerning traveller.

hotels.description: The building is in the heart of the Baixa Pombalina, right beside the City Hall. Caís do Sodré Station is the only square in Lisbon where guests can get to any form of transport. Cais do Sodré station is a 2-minute walk from the apartments. Flexibility is guaranteed with 18 different bus routes within a 2-minute walk from the apartment building. Lisbon Portela Airport is approximately 15 km away from the establishment.  The building was fully redesigned in 2011 and finished to luxury standards with innovative and functional decoration. The building houses 8 spacious apartments and a cosy little studio for short but busy stays. Shared facilities available to guests at this city hotel include a 24-hour check-out service and lift access to the upper floors. Room service is also provided.  The building houses 8 spacious apartments with a living room, fully equipped kitchen and one or two bedrooms, each with an en suite bathroom. There is also a cosy little studio. The T1 apartments measure 75 m2 and can accommodate up to 4 people. The T2 duplex apartment measures 110 m2 and can accommodate up to 6 people. Both have a spacious living room that includes a sofa-bed and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities. The studio is an open-plan space perfect for a couple. It has a fully equipped kitchenette and comes with a table and 2 chairs, one sofa-bed and a bathroom with a shower, bathtub and a hairdryer. Further standard features of accommodation units include a satellite/cable TV, Internet access and an iron and ironing board, as well as a double bed and individually regulated air conditioning.  Guests can use the Aerobus from the airport and alight at Cais do Sodre.

Guests will find different public transport links within walking distance, and Alameda subway station provides easy access to the historic centre, whilst the red line takes travellers to the Oriente train station and to the Airport. Guests will find a harmonious ambience and a professional and friendly staff ready to assist them when needed. The establishment also provides a welcome tea in each one of the 75 rooms, and guests will appreciate the calm and peacefulness of the lounge area. National and international daily press and information flyers are available every day for visitors’ convenience. This establishment is the ideal choice to spend an unforgettable holiday experience with the family, or for business travellers wishing to continue their work in the comfort of their room.

hotels.description: The apartments are located in a charming historical district close to Chiado Square, one of the most symbolic squares in Lisbon. The property is also close to the exclusive Cais do Sodré area and to other central locations. The bus station and the nearest metro station are around 5 minutes walk away, as is the city centre. Lisbon Airport is about 10 km from the hotel. By the night, this square has lot of nightlife.  Luxurious and totally remodelled in 2009, the 10 apartments on 5 floors are furnished with a fully fitted kitchen, living room and dining area. They are ideal for the traveller who wants all the comforts of home combined with the services and standards of a hotel. The apartments provide a perfect combination of the two. Facilities include a lobby, 24-hour check-out service and lift access to the apartments. A hairdressing salon, wireless Internet access and laundry service are also on offer.  The deluxe 1-bedroom apartments have a spacious living room including a sofa bed that sleeps two adults. The bedroom has two single beds. The kitchen is fully fitted, including a fridge, cooker, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities, and has a dining area and laundry facilities. The luxury 2-bedroom apartments have a large living and dining room area. They have two bedrooms, and the kitchen is fully fitted and equipped and the apartment includes laundry facilities. In all cases the private bathroom offers a shower, bath and hairdryer. Other standard amenities include satellite/ cable TV, Internet access, an ironing set and individually regulated air conditioning.

hotels.description: A boutique hotel in Lisbon reviving the glamour of the Portuguese 40s. With 70 rooms, the panoramic Restaurant Rossio and central location near Lisbon's iconic Rossio, Restauradores squares and Church of São Roque, Santa Justa lift, and Figueira Square. The hotel is close to the most famous restaurants and shops in Lisbon with immediate access to Lisbon's major public transportation systems. hotels.description: This hotel enjoys a charming setting in Lisbon. Guests will find themselves immersed in the rich culture of the city, within easy access of a wide range of attractions. The hotel sits on Lisbon's famous, main square, Rossio. The hotel boasts stunning views over the Castelo de Sao Jorge, the Dona Maria II National Theatre and the old town districts of Alfama and Baixa. The centre of Rossio is just a short walking distance away, where guests will find a wealth of shopping, dining and entertainment opportunities. This charming hotel enjoys a classical design. The guest rooms are beautifully appointed, with original furnishings and a graceful ambiance. Guests are sure to be pleased by the many facilities and services that the hotel has to offer.

Located directly on the famous Praça Luis de Camões Square, numerous restaurants, bars, cafés, shops, art galleries and Fado houses are in the immediate vicinity. The top floor terrace enjoys a breathtaking view over the rooftops of Lisbon, the river Tagus and the picturesque bridge at sunset.

hotels.description: Beautifully situated at the heart of Lisbon's historical district, this charming aparthotel offers guests the ideal setting from which to experience the culture and history of this captivating city. The hotel is located just a 5 minutes' walking distance away from the Praca do Comercio, the Figueira, and the Rossio. Guests will find themselves perfectly positioned to explore the attractions the city has to offer. The complex features stunningly-appointed apartments, set in charming 18th century building. The apartments feature soothing, crisp white tones, and delightful splashes of vibrant and muted tones. The apartments come complete with a range of modern amenities, ensuring that the needs of even the most discerning travellers are catered for.

hotels.description: This luxurious establishment features a prime situation in the Baixa Pombalina district, in the heart of Lisbon. It offers the ideal situation from which to explore the hidden treasures of the city, including the historical St. George's castle, a strongly fortified citadel dating back to the medieval period of Portuguese history. Rossio square, one of its main squares since the Middle Ages, is just a few steps away, and guests will find a tourist tram stop right in front of the hotel. This stylish establishment features a total of 350 rooms, including 3 lavish suites. All the accommodation units have been equipped and decorated to provide maximum comfort and convenience in an elegant environment. The onsite facilities include the outstanding panoramic restaurant “Varanda de Lisboa”, offering stunning views over the old city combined with an excellent cuisine.

hotels.description: Just a 5-minute walking distance from the Marquês de Pombal Square in central Lisbon, this upscale establishment offers the ideal accommodation for those eager to explore all this enchanting city has to offer. Picoas metro stop is only 348 metres from the hotel, and Rossio Square is 1 kilometre away. Avenidas Novas is a great choice for travellers interested in gourmet food and discovering the monuments of the city. The hotel offers a choice of air-conditioned guest rooms featuring modern services such as Wi-Fi internet connection and flat-screen TV, decorated in a modern style with parquet floors and wooden furniture. A wide choice of facilities are offered at this hotel, including a restaurant serving international cuisine and a bar offering light meals, afternoon teas and evening cocktails. Guests can also enjoy a moment of relaxation in the reading room or benefit from the car rental service.

hotels.description: Recently remodeled, the hotel is Lisbon's hidden gem, conveniently located just 10 minutes away from both Lisbon's International Airport as well as the city center (Baixa).   Our contemporary style and welcoming environment is ideal to rest and visit the pitoresque Fado capital. Combining safety with convenience, we have private parking available to our guests.   The hotel offers free WIFI Internet access so you may browse the Internet and stay connected to the rest of the world. Start your day savoring our delicious Breakfast Buffet located on the top floor accompanied with a breathtaking panoramic view overlooking the city and the Tagus River.   At the hotel we guarantee the best value for money, offering a high level of hospitality quality and outstanding services. All our rooms are designed with a sober, charming and contemporary feel providing you with comfort, tranquility and a relaxing atmosphere. The rooms, ranging from single to quadruple rooms, are all equipped with private bathroom, hair dryer, air conditioning, heating, plasma screen cable TV, safety deposit box, phone, magnetic keys and double glazed windows. We offer a variety of personalized services designed to make your stay memorable and stress free, namely our Premium shuttle service offering you the possibility of a tailored and comfortable journey both from and/or to Lisbon's International Airport.  Our friendly multilingual Front Desk team is entirely at your disposal to provide you with any assistance you may require at any time: Information/ Travelling inquiries; Rental services (car, mini vans, shuttles, bicycles...); City/Guided tours; Laundry/Dry Cleaning services; Reservations (restaurants, events, shows…); Currency exchange; Babysitting service .  If your trip has a business character, the hotel has at your disposal conference rooms suitable to all your needs, with catering service also available.

hotels.description: Porto Bay Liberdade is located in the heart of the Portuguese capital, next to Avenida da Liberdade on Rua Rosa Araújo, the design of architect Frederico Valsassina preserves the historical façade of the early 20th-Century Lisbon manor in a dialogue between the old and the contemporary. The environment and décor evoke details from the past, with the constant elements of old wood and marble. This charming boutique hotel, with features of a resort in an urban setting, offers comfort, timelessness, hospitality and the well-known service of Porto Bay Hotels & Resorts. A bright spotlight joining the spectacular, well-known natural city lights of Lisbon.

hotels.description: Right in the heart of Parque das Nações, the Hotel Tryp Lisboa Oriente was recently refurbished with “Expo 98” and the Oceans as its background. At the entrance, visitors are met by a series of ocean aquariums together with a canvas, in the reception area, representing the great architectural landmarks. The rooms emphasise elegance, modernity and comfort, and lend a view of the heart of the city. They have free Wi-Fi access, a Television with satellite channels, a lounge area, telephone with a direct line and air conditioning.  The “Bistrô&Tapas” Restaurant, which extends out to a pleasant esplanade, displays the most iconic symbol of Expo 98: panels which reflect the universality of the event and convey the popular Exhibition passport. The restaurant serves international breakfasts and offers an à la carte service and a dish of the day, based on the “Bistrô&Tapas” concept.

hotels.description: Figueira, this is the name of the square in Lisbon's downtown that is home to one of the world's most unique hotels. Born from the earth, from the roots to the canopy, covering all floors, Figueira is the hotel´s soul. Green and brown shades, pure nature colours, give life to the 50 rooms decorated with fig leaves, fig and trunk images, thus creating a perfect harmony environment between nature, architecture and comfort. It is located within short walking distance from Lisbon´s most important monuments (Castle of São Jorge, Lisbon´s Cathedral) and the most typical quarters (Bairro Alto and Alfama).
